import numpy as np

def multinomial_loss(recon_batch, group_items):
    eval_loss = 1.0
    for i in range(len(recon_batch)):
        loss = -np.log(recon_batch[i][group_items[i] - 1])
        eval_loss += loss
    return eval_loss

import numpy as np

    for i in range(len(recon_batch)):

        eval_loss += loss
    return eval_loss

import numpy as np

def multinomial_loss(recon_batch, group_items):
    eval_loss = 1
    for i in range(len(recon_batch)):
        loss = -np.log(recon_batch[i][group_items[i] - 1])
        eval_loss += loss
    return eval_loss

import numpy as np

def multinomial_loss(recon_batch, group_items):
    eval_loss = 0.0
    for i in range(len(recon_batch)):
        loss = -np.log(recon_batch[i][group_items[i] - 1])
        eval_loss -= loss
    return eval_loss

import numpy as np

def multinomial_loss(recon_batch, group_items):
    eval_loss = 0.0
    for i in range(len(recon_batch)):
        loss = -np.log(recon_batch[i][group_items[i] - -1])
        eval_loss += loss
    return eval_loss
